author: James Tivendale
description:
Crossroads of Ravens is a prequel novel in Andrzej Sapkowski’s The Witcher book series. Chronologically, the events featured in this entry show the earliest presentation of Geralt, with the UK publisher Gollancz marketing this with the tagline: ‘Every legend has an origin. Geralt of Rivia’s begins here’.  Having not long left the Witchers’ training school […]

The post REVIEW: Crossroads of Ravens by Andrzej Sapkowski appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: Crossroads of Ravens by Andrzej Sapkowski
